title: Evidence-Based Medicine (EBM) Capstone Design in Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge, research methodology understanding, and VR simulation utilization experience
context.additional_context: Learners perform EBM (Evidence-Based Medicine) stage simulations in a smartphone-based VR environment, training to apply evidence-based approaches to real clinical scenarios. Mobile-optimized content is structured to deliver effective learning experiences even in limited-technology settings

learning_goals: Learners can apply the PICO framework to clinical scenarios and formulate three or more systematic research questions.
Learners can establish and execute search strategies with over 80% accuracy on mobile-optimized databases such as PubMed/Google Scholar.
Learners can select and critique at least three evidence-based papers meeting recency (within 5 years) and credibility (JCR Q1 journals) criteria.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
